name: Neon Blaster
description:
Controls:  Start or Restart = Enter

                       Moving = W and S

                       Shoot = left mouse click

In this game, You are a square that has a square that can shoot a gun which can destroy anything from meteors to other big squares, Your goal is to avoid being hit for more than three times, and if you avoid the 300 asteroids and meteors, You get to fight a final boss.

I am appreciative of any comment on this game,  good or bad, I want to make this a good first, Thanks for reading!
